Positive Attitude
 

     Be cheerful and happy without indulging in lightness or frivolity.--Jesting, joking, and worldly conversation belong to the world. Christians who have the peace of God in their hearts, will be cheerful and happy without indulging in lightness or frivolity. While watching unto prayer, they will have a serenity and peace which will elevate them above all superfluities.--3T 241.
